challenge.heading: the challenge
challenge.paragraph1: A website is often the first impression a customer gets of your company. Many companies today have a site that no longer reflects their business, lacks important features, or doesn't work well on mobile devices.
challenge.paragraph2: This can cause potential customers to move on to competitors. A fast, professional, and modern website makes the difference between just being visible and actually being chosen.
challenge.paragraph3: Whether you lack a website or want to modernize an existing one, I help you create a solution that strengthens your brand and simplifies for your customers.

packages.heading: packages
packages.intro: Choose a package based on your current needs. All packages are delivered with the same high standard and always include the following features.

premium.name: Premium Web
premium.description: For companies that want a complete and scalable solution.

features.aiSeo: AI SEO optimization (smart analysis of keywords and content)
features.analytics: Optional integration for advanced statistics and analysis with reporting
features.multilang: Custom multilingual support (1 additional language included)

premium.suitedFor: Suited for: Companies that want a flexible website that can grow with their business.

growth.name: Growth Web
growth.description: For companies that want to be more visible and provide customers with more information.

features.cms: Content management system (CMS) for easy updates

growth.suitedFor: Suited for: Established companies that want to grow digitally and improve their visibility.

starter.name: Starter Web
starter.description: For companies that want a simple but professional online presence.

features.landing: A modern, mobile-optimized and user-friendly landing page

starter.suitedFor: Suited for: Smaller companies or individual businesses that want to get started quickly.

addons.heading: add-ons
addons.intro: Expand as needed and customize your solution with additional add-ons.

items.seo: SEO analysis with ongoing improvements (monthly or quarterly contracts)

items.aiText: Integration of AI text suggestions (blog, news, product descriptions)
items.custom: Custom AI solutions for internal processes

items.booking: Integration with booking systems, CRM or email platforms
items.payment: Integration with payment solutions (Stripe, Klarna, Swish, etc.)
items.api: API integrations between various systems (e.g. quote systems, logistics or internal apps)

items.strategy: Consultation on digital strategy, system architecture or cloud infrastructure
items.domain: Help with domain management and DNS
items.special: Special requests or custom solutions are always discussed

tools.heading: tools
tools.description: I work with modern and well-known technologies that are industry standard. This guarantees a stable and future-proof solution that is easy to maintain and develop further.

process.heading: process
process.intro: I work in close dialogue with you to make the project smooth, transparent and efficient. You always know what's happening and when.

analysis.title: Needs analysis and planning
analysis.description: We review what type of website you're looking for and which of my services suit you. We also go through your goals, target audience and content.

design.title: Design and demo
design.description: You get a clickable preview of a simpler version of your future website so that both you and I can feel confident before the next step.

payment1.title: First payment
payment1.description: 50 percent of the total price is paid at start.

development.title: Development and testing
development.description: I build your website according to your wishes and test performance and functionality.

feedback.title: Demo, feedback and requests
feedback.description: You get another demo with the finished design and have the opportunity to provide feedback and requests.

payment2.title: Second payment
payment2.description: When you're satisfied with the result, the remaining 50 percent is paid.

launch.title: Launch and support
launch.description: The site is published and I'm available for questions, follow-up and future collaborations.
